acts.what: AATT with HTML CodeSniffer WCAG 2.1 AA ruleset

result.msg: This textinput element does not have a name available to an accessibility API. Valid names are: label element, title , aria-label , aria-labelledby .

This form field should be labelled in some way. Use the label element (either with a "for" attribute or wrapped around the form field), or "title", "aria-label" or "aria-labelledby" attributes as appropriate.
Semantic markup should be used to mark emphasised or special text so that it can be programmatically determined.
